descriptionHtml:
UPDATE Mosin Nagant 0.4

Thanks everyone for helping me bugtest. I haven\'t modded since 2007 when I made mods
for Obivion, and let me tell you skyrim is a WHOLE different process. Look for more soon!

=====================================================================

UPDATE Mosin Nagant 0.2A

DON\'T DOWNLOAD 0.1A!!!!!! DOESN\'T WORK

Looks like I had a few other mods pulled into the CK when I made this one,
for some reason the file was calling \'dawnguardrifle.nif\' as opposed to my .nif.
Should be working now, tried with all mods off and I got it loaded. Sorry for the
mishap.

==================================================================

Mosin Nagant 0.1A

Contents:

-1:Installation/Uninstallation
-2:Operation
-3:The Point

=================================================================

1: Installation/Uninstallation:

To install, simply double-click the \'data\' folder, then drag and drop the \'meshes\', \'textures\'
\'sound\' and \'MosinNagant.esp\' into your Skyrim\\Data folder.

To UNINSTALL, simply delete \"data\\textures\\weapons\\Mosin Nagant\", \"data\\meshes\\dlc01\\Mosin Nagant\",
\"data\\sound\\fx\\wpn\\mosin nagant\" and \"data\\mosinnagant.esp\".

==================================================================

2: Operation:

Operation is simple, simply go to any forge, navigate to the \'steel\' category, scroll down until
you see \'Mosin Nagant\' and click \'craft\'. Crafting of the rifle consumes 2x Steel Ingots and 2x
Firewood.

==================================================================

3: The Point:

I really love firearms and happen to own a Mosin Nagant M1891/30 and M1891/44 Carbine, and wanted
to be able to use them in game. The damage isn\'t too overpowered, I use the crossbow increased 
damage mod anyway, and the highest damage crossbow makes about 45 or 44 damage. This rifle makes
a BASE 40 damage, so It\'s not going to be 1 shotting everything in the world. I play on master so
maybe that makes the difference, but it takes a good 3-4+ hits to kill something with this rifle.
author: tony1991
